exercise.title: Average Temperatures
exercise.p:
Make a program that shows the average temperatures for Helsinki (the full year). Write that information to the console. Here is how you create an array object containing the average temperatures for all twelve months.
var temperatures = [-3.3, -4.7, -1.3, 3.9, 10.2, 14.6, 17.8, 16.3, 11.5, 6.6, 1.6, -2.0];
Submit a link to your code (myy etc).
